评论详情: I thought this sweatshirt looked stylish and was different from my boring hoodies that I usually wear. It was just okay when trying on. The top quilted fabric started to pill after 1 wash and 1 wear and the fabric on the bottom for some reason became stiff and no longer had any stretch. I thought it was expensive for the poor quality. Unfortunately, I would not recommend!

I was disappointed in the material of this pullover and did end up returning it. I ordered the white quilted quarter snap and the snap color (navy?) had rubbed off onto the white material in one spot during shipping and I wasn’t sure it would come out with washing it. Given my impression of the low quality of the fabric, I didn’t want to risk it not coming out and being stuck with it so I was happy it was eligible for a return.  I bought a similar version of this last year and wanted a replacement for that one as I loved it and get so many compliments on it whenever I wear it but it did get quite pilled after so much wear. This one is definitely not the same. The cuffs and collar also lacked structure, the material seemed too thin and floppy. Sad it didn’t work out better.  The size did fit well though! I ordered a small which was great for me. 5’6” 140 lbs

Very soft, very comfortable, fit great, as described. Spot on center chest just below snap placard and a spot on the neck left side. At first I thought it was a shadow with the quilted pattern but unfortunately not. Otherwise would keep.

Pros: True to Size: I’m 190 pounds, and the XL fits perfectly! It’s not too tight but still gives a nice, flattering shape.  Stylish Design: The quilted pattern adds a nice touch of style, and the zipper detail makes it feel a little more elevated than your basic sweater.  Comfortable: It’s lightweight, so it’s perfect for layering, and it's not too heavy or bulky. Great for casual outings or just lounging around.  Cons: Limited Room for Layering: If you want to wear something loose underneath, like a t-shirt, it doesn’t allow for much extra room. It’s best suited for wearing with something fitted under it.  Not as Warm as Heavier Sweaters: It’s more of a lightweight sweater, so it’s not the best for super cold weather.  This sweater is great if you're looking for something stylish yet comfy. The fit is true to size, and it’s perfect for casual wear. Just keep in mind, it’s not meant for layering bulky items underneath. I’d definitely recommend it for anyone who wants a cute and comfortable sweater for everyday wear!

I ordered two of these, and I like them very much except for one thing. I was going to send it back, but thought that I would try to get the marks out myself. I put spray and wash on overnight and washed  the next day. The spots did come out, but I would have preferred them not be there at all.

评论概述: Just what I was hoping for
评论详情: I never know how clothing is going to be when I buy from Amazon and there’s a seller whose name I don’t know.  I took a chance on this and it’s just what I wanted, though.  I’m an XL (sometimes a large) but foreign-made clothing sometimes either runs absurdly small or just boxy. Sometimes it seems as though people outside of the US don’t understand that human women can be shaped like human women still—just bigger.  That said, the XL fit great.  The material is thin. This isn’t exactly something that I expect to keep me warm, but I was actually looking for something to wear when it’s in the 60s and pleasant out. So, this is just right.

Update: leaving my original review but taking a star off because other colors are fine, but I purchased the maroon color and it was so far off from the color and honestly, ugly. It is more of a strawberry red/pink. I see other reviews were the same so that is partially on me too. I will be returning and probably won’t be buying anymore of these sweaters, especially colored ones. I purchased the gray one and later the dark green/teal one and I love them both. So much so I am contemplating getting another color 😅 They wash well, don’t shrink, don’t stretch out or fade over time. I have had 0 issues with the zipper. The gray one I have had for a couple of years now and it’s still going strong! These are easy to throw on and pack well for traveling. You won’t regret this purchase!
